item.title: Ideas, Interests and Foreign Aid
item.description: Table of contents: The many uses of foreign aid One policy, multiple goals: framing and foreign aid Debates about aid: contents and patterns Aid frames: origins and evolution The administration of aid policy The generosity contest: determinants of aid volume The popularity contest: selecting the recipients of aid Conclusion: frames and policy
